## Protocol.HeapProfiler.TakeHeapSnapshotRequest.reportProgress property

If true 'reportHeapSnapshotProgress' events will be generated while snapshot is being taken.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
reportProgress?: boolean;
```
